nodes.text: Dragon's Spine was a large chain of snow-capped mountains on the forest moon of Endor at the edge of the Dragon's Pelt. Condor dragons lived in caves inside the high peaks.
In 3 ABY, Noa Briqualon, Cindel Towani, Wicket Wystri Warrick, and a group of Ewoks from Bright Tree Village escaped from Terak's castle in these mountains.
